title: List of songs written by Ki Hui-hyeon
text:
Ki Hui-hyeon (born June 16, 1995), better known by the mononym Huihyun and former <a href="stage%20name">stage name</a> Cathy, is a South Korean singer and rapper. She is best known as a member of the South Korean <a href="girl%20group">girl group</a> <a href="Dia%20%28band%29">DIA</a>.
All song credits are adapted from the <a href="Korea%20Music%20Copyright%20Association">Korea Music Copyright Association</a>'s database, unless otherwise noted.
